main event: The report contains multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects, including a bright light moving in a straight line, an orange teardrop-shaped object observed for eight minutes, and a large, round, brilliant white light that changed color to red, moved erratically at high speed, and made sharp turns.
interesting points: One sighting involved a bright light estimated to be 300 feet off the ground, moving in a straight line and disappearing over the horizon.
Another sighting described an orange teardrop-shaped object at an estimated altitude of over 20,000 feet, observed for eight minutes.

The report also mentioned a large, round, brilliant white light which changed color to red, moved erratically at high speed, and made sharp turns, observed through a periscope for approximately 15 minutes.
Observations were made visually, and one sighting involved radar tracking as well as visual confirmation by the pilot and co-pilot of an aircraft.
The existence of physical evidence was reported as none in all cases, and the report requested intelligence regarding the incidents.
sighted object: Various unidentified flying objects, including bright lights, teardrop shapes, and large round brilliant white lights
